actions.committee: Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Appropriations, and in addition to the Committee on House Administration, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

official_title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.J. Res. 62.

summary.text: Directs the Clerk of the House of Representatives to correct the enrollment of H.J. Res. 62 (Stability, Security, and Fairness Resolution of 2013).

titles.title: Directing the Clerk of the House of Representatives to make corrections in the enrollment of H.J. Res. 62.
